tr.td: Estimated number of discriminable olfactory stimuli
Number of distinct compounds available to make mixtures
Number of distinct compounds in a mixture
Number of distinct compounds shared by a mixture pair
Number of distinct compounds in one mixture of a pair that are not shared by the other. (D=N−O)
All mixture pairs with the same value of N and D.
The value of D for which mixture pairs of a given N are more likely than not to be discriminable at a rate significantly above chance.
